biotools.summary: System specifically designed for plant gene normalization. This website enables user search gene normalization information by keywords, a list of PMIDs, or UniProt ACs in the database. The results (Gene names and corresponding UniProt ACs) are displayed in sortable tables with text evidence and downloadable for further research.

bioschemas.name: pGenN
